titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to ensure military airports are eligible for certain grant funds.
To amend title 49, United States Code, to ensure military airports are eligible for certain grant funds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary: This bill expands the program of grants for development of military airports to include former military installations that are categorized as primary airports.
